# MimeMapping class

Maps document extensions to content MIME types.

```csharp
public static class MimeMapping
```

## Public Members

| --- | --- |
| static [GetMimeMapping](MimeMapping/GetMimeMapping.md)(…) | Returns the MIME mapping for the specified file extension. |
